body: Hi folks I ran into a problem when trying out Honeybee surface flux simulation. Can you please have a look at my definition and explain why this is happening: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/knSjhwKOr7sJJr9LR2CmSOspdIth9ZyGg9IJQr6BMXHLb75eSXuXlll1U17kFENY2mNjszxMiCWXP52uybGjvvdOjOwUI7gA/InitializingSimulation.PNG) It might not be infinite but I haven't got beyond the initialization state when I input slightly more complicated breps than a cube.  Best regards  Kristoffer
